title: Don't Close Your Eyes
description: "A thrilling tale about an independent woman in a love triangle." - Kirkus ReviewsLove at first sight is for hopeless romantics, not a hitman who’s amassed a fortune leading a double life. If only Kinsley Hayes hadn’t stumbled into my crosshairs ….***He was edgy, intense, older than me.Since the night I’d fled my attraction to the handsome stranger, I prayed I’d see him again.Then, one day, while I mixed drinks behind the bar, he walked in on the same night my crush confessed his feelings for me.My simple life of college and track drained into an underworld of peril and passion so dangerous, I risked everything for him, including my life.This is our story.
author: Lynessa James
